item.title: Genworth MI Canada Inc. Schedules Fourth Quarter 2016 Earnings Conference Call for February 8th, 2017
Genworth MI Canada Inc. Schedules Fourth Quarter 2016 Earnings Conference Call for February 8th, 2017
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO, Jan. 26, 2017 /CNW/ - Genworth MI Canada Inc. (the "Company") (MIC.TO) today announced it will issue its earnings release and financial supplement containing the quarterly results after the market closes on February 7th, 2017. Investor materials will be available on the Company's website, http://investor.genworthmicanada.ca, in advance of the call. Genworth MI Canada Inc.'s conference call will be accessible via telephone and via webcast on the Company's website.
